metadata.title: CVE-2022-21831 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: A code injection vulnerability exists in the Active Storage >= v5.2.0 thatcould allow an attacker to execute code via image_processing arguments.

criterions.comment: rails: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
